abstract: Squibb Park Bridge linking Brooklyn Heights to Brooklyn Bridge Park has been closed for full year, despite assertion by Brooklyn Bridge Park Corp that closure would be temporary; park corporation has refused to offer updated opening date.
lead_paragraph: The closing of the Squibb Park Bridge last Aug. 11 was supposed to be temporary. Several deadlines for its reopening have come and gone, and now park officials refuse to give a new target date.

headline.main: One Year Later, ‘Bouncy Bridge’ in Brooklyn Remains Closed
headline.print_headline: One Year On, Bridge to Park Is Still Closed

snippet: The closing of the Squibb Park Bridge last Aug. 11 was supposed to be temporary. Several deadlines for its reopening have come and gone, and now park officials refuse to give a new target date.
